name: HANG EN CAVE - 2 DAY ADVENTURE
description: Your adventure will be partially spent in the heart of Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park, where you can explore fascinating nature with many fantastic factors such as vast primary forest, poetic natural landscape, Karst systems over 400 million years. Spectacular of the Hang En cave with thousands of swallows inside, blue streams as well as unforgetable nights are the same feeling for all visitors joining this tour.
